cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content

Class ModelGraphLayoutPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane
              • cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content.ModelGraphLayoutPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatePersistable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class ModelGraphLayoutPane
extends javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane
implements StatePersistable
    Class representing the main content pane that has all the permanent nodes of type DraggableContentNode.

      • handleLibraryDrop

        public void handleLibraryDrop(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent e)
        Should be invoked after a LibraryNode has been dropped into this pane. A new FxModelNode will be created and placed onto content pane with coordinates from the DragEvent event.
        Parameters:
        e - event that has the original source node and content pane coordinates
